long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This AdBlock is designed to work exclusively on YouTube website, it hides any ads shown during the video playback and those on the home page.

Custom features:
- Focus mode, you can toggle it in the player settings menu (or by pressing "s")
- Picture in Picture mode, you can toggle it with player controls (or by pressing "p")
- Like button shortcut, by pressing "Enter"

Things to know:
-  Shorts with ads are automatically skipped
-  Some videos may not be saved to history if watched for a too short time
-  Miniplayer mode and Theater mode are disabled
-  Live chats are disabled
-  Some buttons and menu options are hidden
-  Main player controls are not the same as the default one
-  Tab selection is disabled
-  Sometimes pages may be a bit laggy
